ARABIC: إِنَّ فِى ذَٰلِكَ لَعِبْرَةً لِّمَن يَخْشَىٰٓ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: There is certainly instruction in that for those who fear.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: Truly there is a lesson in this for those who fear (the consequences).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: Surely there is a great lesson in it for whoever would fear (Allah).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: In this there is a lesson for those who have fear of God.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: Indeed in this is a lesson for one who fears.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: In this is a lesson for whoever fears.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: Most surely there is in this a lesson to him who fears.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: Surely in that is a lesson for him who fears!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: Lo! herein is indeed a lesson for him who feareth.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: surely there is in this a lesson for the God-fearing.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Verily herein is lesson for him who feareth.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: There is indeed a moral in that for someone who fears!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: Verily in this is an instructive warning for whosoever feareth (Allah).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: Verily, in this is an instructive admonition for whosoever fears Allah.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: Surely, in this there is a lesson for he that fears!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: In this is a lesson for whoever fears.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: Indeed in that is a warning for whoever would fear [Allah].
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [79:26] Assuredly in that, which is mentioned, there is a moral for him who fears, God, exalted be He.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (Lo! Herein) in that which We did to Pharaoh and his host (is indeed a lesson) an admonition (for him who feareth) that which has been done to them.
